Use one of our three convenient options to
renew your tags ON-LINE, by PHONE, or via MAIL.

span.strong: A MESSAGE FROM THE JEFFERSON COUNTY CLERK

div.p: ** ALL JEFFERSON COUNTY CLERK OFFICES ARE CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC **

p.img: The Jefferson County Clerk’s Office’s top priority is the health and safety of our employees and customers. Following the Governor’s recent mandate, all offices of the County Clerk will be closed to the public. However, we will continue to offer the online, telephone and mail-in renewal options, as well as online voter registration and legal records searches. The following resources can help assist any Jefferson County resident while eliminating an in-person visit to our office.

div.p: MOTOR VEHICLE TAG RENEWAL: Residents can renew here, on our webpage, or via telephone by calling 502.569.3300. Mail-in renewals can be sent to P.O. Box 33033, Louisville, KY 40232-3033. Transactions such as vehicle, boat, and trailer transfers (both in-state and out-of-state), and duplicate title requests can be mailed to our office as long as the appropriate documentation has been completed.

ACCESSING REAL ESTATE RECORDS ONLINE: Rather than stopping by the Deed Room in Metro Hall, our Legal Records department is now offering e-recording services to those who have access to this service. Please click on this link for more information on this service; jeffersoncountyclerk.org/recording-indexing. Similarly, we offer an index of all real estate records from 1984 to present. Simply click on ‘Legal Records’ and navigate to ‘On-line Land Records’.

VOTER REGISTRATION: If you need to update your voter registration, you may do so here, on our webpage, by clicking ‘Voter Info’. You can also register to vote or at govoteky.com. If you need to contact the Jefferson County Clerk’s Election Center, please call 502.574.6100. The Election Center is closed.

MARRIAGE AND NOTARY LICENSES: Marriage licenses are by appointment only to Jefferson County residents (Call: 502.574.5884). Notary oath and bonding are suspended until further notice. [Click here for more details]
We will continue to keep you updated with any changes to the above services.
My hope is that you and your family remain in the best of health.

h6.a: Notice of document recording fee increase for 2020
Legal Records Division of JCCO New Deed Room Surroundings

div.p:
Clerk's Main Office
527 W. Jefferson Street
Louisville, KY 40202-2814
502.574.5700

Mail Correspondence to:
Jefferson County Clerk's Office
Attn: (list department name)
P.O. Box 33033
Louisville, KY 40232-3033

Main Office Hours*
8AM - 5PM, Monday - Friday
Motor Vehicle Branch Hours*
8:30AM – 4:30PM, Monday - Friday
*see holiday schedule

701 West Ormsby Ave., STE 301
Louisville, KY 40203-3143

","select_all_link":"Select all pages","clear_selection":"Clear Selection.","pagination":{"all":"All","next":"Next","previous":"Previous"},"select":{"rows":{"0":"","_":": Selected %d rows","1":": Selected 1 row"}},"datepicker":{"dayNames":["Sunday","Monday","Tuesday","Wednesday","Thursday","Friday","Saturday"],"dayNamesShort":["Sun","Mon","Tue","Wed","Thu","Fri","Sat"],"dayNamesMin":["S","M","T","W","T","F","S"],"monthNames":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"monthNamesShort":["January","February","March","April","May","June","July","August","September","October","November","December"],"nextText":"Next","prevText":"Prev","currentText":"Today","closeText":"Done"}};var tribe_system_info = {"sysinfo_optin_nonce":"1fea3f88c5","clipboard_btn_text":"Copy to clipboard","clipboard_copied_text":"System info copied","clipboard_fail_text":"Press \"Cmd + C\" to copy"};/* */
